metadata.synopsis: goblin raider attacking a druid grove full of tiefling refugees in a huge assault

0.speaker: Warrior Jawn
0.context: NodeContext: Goblin language battle cry - translates as "ATTACK!". Shouted while running into battle.  (Ke-wreck-NOR)

1.speaker: Warrior Jawn
1.context: NodeContext: After a great victory in which many civilians were slaughtered. Exalting their new god, the Absolute. Believes the player is also a follower of their faith
